snippet.title: 《Project 2/3》PV＆Gameplay Trailer——Which world line we step into this time?
snippet.description:
《Project 2/3》is an anime-style open-world ARPG independently developed by Diversity Game Studio. In the game, you wander through time and dimensions alongside your guide, Theseus. You will travel across time and space, transitioning between 2D and 3D worlds, embarking on an adventure to rewrite the past. Along the way, you will meet diverse companions, journey through different eras and distinct dimensions, uncover the causes of chaos and enemies, and ultimately find the answers about yourself and the world.


Chinese CV：
Verthandi——闫夜桥
Theseus——周侗
Louisa——杏林儿
Carlo——吕鹏
Eleanor——香凝
Rossana——郭新蕾
Denida——蔡海婷
Chione——高亚亚
